title: Epic 6: Verify CRUD parity and quality gates
description: All scenarios pass, parity checker clean, coverage 100%, quality gates pass. CRUD operations fully functional.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: verify CRUD parity and run quality gates. Acceptance: parity check and quality gates results recorded.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Ran parity and quality gates: python tools/check_spec_parity.py; cd python && black . && ruff check . && pytest; cd rust && cargo fmt --check && cargo clippy -- -D warnings && cargo test
